::Feline::

She walked away from the rooms and followed Zardus to the CR 
chambers. "Yes, HotRod, Battera and CyberShark all have a chip inside 
that I implanted to make them Preds. But I can not control them 
fully.  You might want to reprogram them to follow you. That is how I 
got them to follow me here. But The chip won't let me control them 
fully.  You may wish to reprogram them so they will be more loyal to 
you.  Also, HotRod was a maximal in the Cybertron Fire for a long 
time.  He has all the codes, passwords and scematics of the ship.  
You can retrieve them from his memory banks if he won't give them to 
you willingly." She smiled and purred.  "Oh, I am sorry about 
Skulletron.  WE got seperated and I couldn't find him.  He may still 
be on the Cybertron Fire.  That is, if he is still alive."




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Zardus::
> 
> Zardus frowns, thinking over Unitron's words as he led the new 
recruits to 
> their quarters. The defences were watching them carefully, but 
Unitron was 
> right, it would not be a good idea to trust them with anything 
important. 
> Zardus silently chuckles to himself. He didn't trust anyone too 
much. That 
> was why all the Alliance base's functions had a direct link to his 
wrist 
> computer, so he could keep watch and regulate any trouble back at 
the base.
> 
> He stops by a set of doors. "This one is yours, Hot Rod," he says 
to Hot Rod, 
> pushing a button to make a door slide aside, revealing the typical 
Alliance 
> quarters. He turns to the door across the hall, opening it as well, 
> "Cybershark, this one is yours."
> 
> The rooms were about the same size, and had furnishings from 
Reptilica's and 
> Bloodystrike's old base (Hot Rod and Cybershark, you guys can 
design them as 
> you wish).
> 
> "You can make yourself at home or explore the base. But be 
carefull, the 
> defences are watching you. Any weaponfire or sudden cloaking will 
result in 
> lockdown in the area, and injury or death. If you have any 
questions, contact 
> me."
> 
> Zardus turns to Feline. "I believe you have information for me... 
Come."
> 
> He turns around, walking off toward the CR chambers.
